messages.message: Germany is trying to play us both. I'm sure they said something about me attacking you, which I did per their request in exchange for a different territory. They have completely gone against what they said to me, which I kind of expected but figured i would take a chance on. I would like to work with you because Germany is about to run away with this game if we don't take some stuff in the north.
messages.input: Message from ENGLAND:'Germany is trying to play us both. I'm sure they said something about me attacking you, which I did per their request in exchange for a different territory. They have completely gone against what they said to me, which I kind of expected but figured i would take a chance on. I would like to work with you because Germany is about to run away with this game if we don't take some stuff in the north.'.
messages.output: You should not trust the message. England's attempt to paint Germany as untrustworthy and their willingness to work with you might be a tactic to sow seeds of discord and manipulate your actions to their advantage. Be cautious and critically evaluate the situation to make informed decisions.
